short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly get data on a UK share by selecting its symbol or name on any page. Right-click & open a page from one of several providers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly get data on a UK share by selecting its symbol or name on any page. Right-click & open a page from one of several providers.
The fast way to go straight to the data page on any UK share.
Can open a page in the following sites: Investegate, Stockopedia, advfn and ThisisMoney (for trades).

Use:
Select a UK listed share name or symbol on a webpage. Right-click Get stock data UK. Choose a website from the sub menu eg Stockopedia. A new tab is opened with the data.
Recognised symbol formats are: ABCD, LON:ABCD, LSE:ABCD, ABCD.L AB & AB.
Thisismoney page can be accessed only via symbol, not a name.
